## BasicRowSelectorComponent.resetSelection() method

Resets current selection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  emit | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether emit selection change |
